QuestData.Title: Everything In Its Place
QuestData.Description: You have helped us more than you can ever imagine, $n.$B$BI do not know what I would do if our precious scrolls were ever to be lost.$B$BPlease return to the Elder Sage Rain-Zhu and tell him that the library is in order.
QuestData.LogDescription: Speak to Elder Sage Rain-Zhu at the Temple of the Jade Serpent in Jade Forest.
QuestData.RewardText: Lorewalker Stonestep is back to work?$B$BRemarkable. You were able to do what the last four priests I sent could not.$B$BI...I think my headache is disappearing.
